title: Layers, Bedrock Ridges, and Dark Sand in Schiaparelli Crater
description: Like any diverse group of explorers, scientists on the HiRISE team and the general public who submit target suggestions have different goals and interests for the Mars images they hope to get. More often than not, an image intended for one particular science investigation ends up having many other applications, answering and raising new questions.
